metadata.title: Aroosi - Afghan Matrimony
metadata.shortDescription: Find Your Perfect Afghan Match - Trusted Matrimonial Platform
metadata.fullDescription:
Aroosi is the premier matrimonial platform connecting Afghan singles worldwide. Built with cultural values and modern technology, find your perfect life partner through our secure, respectful, and family-oriented community.

üåü Why Choose Aroosi?

‚úÖ AUTHENTIC COMMUNITY
‚Ä¢ Verified Afghan profiles from around the world
‚Ä¢ Cultural understanding and shared values
‚Ä¢ Family-focused approach to matchmaking
‚Ä¢ Respect for traditions and modern lifestyles

‚úÖ ADVANCED MATCHING
‚Ä¢ Smart algorithm based on compatibility
‚Ä¢ Detailed preference filters
‚Ä¢ Location-based matching
‚Ä¢ Educational and professional compatibility

‚úÖ SECURE & PRIVATE
‚Ä¢ Photo verification and profile moderation
‚Ä¢ Advanced privacy controls
‚Ä¢ Secure messaging platform
‚Ä¢ Block and report features

‚úÖ PREMIUM FEATURES
‚Ä¢ See who viewed your profile
‚Ä¢ Unlimited messaging
‚Ä¢ Profile boost for better visibility

‚Ä¢ Priority customer support

‚úÖ FAMILY INVOLVEMENT

‚Ä¢ Transparent approach to introductions
‚Ä¢ Cultural ceremony planning resources
‚Ä¢ Family tree and background information

Key Features:
üîç Advanced Search & Filters

Join thousands of Afghan singles who have found meaningful connections through Aroosi. Whether you're looking for someone in your city or considering international matches, our platform brings together the global Afghan community in one trusted space.

Download Aroosi today and take the first step towards finding your life partner while honoring your Afghan heritage and values.

Note: Users must be 18+ to create profiles. All profiles are verified and moderated for authenticity and safety.

inAppProducts.title: Premium Monthly Subscription
inAppProducts.description: Unlock unlimited messaging, see who viewed your profile, advanced filters, and priority support for one month.

inAppProducts.title: Premium Plus Monthly Subscription
inAppProducts.description: All Premium features plus incognito browsing, unlimited profile boosts, advanced matching algorithm, and premium customer support.

required.reason: Required for app functionality and communication with servers
Check network connectivity for optimal user experience
Provide haptic feedback for better user interaction
Keep app active during important operations like messaging
Restore app state after device restart

optional.reason: Take profile photos and verify identity
Select photos from gallery for profile pictures
Show nearby matches and improve search results
Find friends who are also using the app (optional)
Secure app access with biometric authentication

dataCollection.dataSharing: Data is not shared with third parties except as described in our Privacy Policy
dataCollection.dataEncryption: Data is encrypted in transit and at rest
dataCollection.dataDeletion: Users can request data deletion through app settings or by contacting support

testAccounts.description: Basic user account for testing core functionality
Premium subscriber account for testing subscription features

testing.testInstructions:
1. Create a profile with valid information
2. Browse other profiles using search filters
3. Send interests and messages
4. Test premium features with premium account
5. Verify photo upload and messaging functionality
6. Test privacy and blocking features
